categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide fiction

nodes.text: Slave Raid is a roleplaying adventure outline in the September 1996 Shadows of the Empire Planets Guide, published by West End Games for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game as part of the Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire multimedia project. The adventure takes players to Vergesso Base in search of a friend/relative who has been captured by slavers.
